**Type of Institute:**
- Masjid
- Surau
- Others

**Name of the Masjid:**
e.g., Masjid ABC

**Name of the City:**
e.g., Kuala Lumpur

**State:**
- Selangor
- Kedah
- Kelantan
- Terengganu
- Sabah
- Sarawak
- Pahang
- W.P. Kuala Lumpur
- Negeri Sembilan
- Johor
- Melaka
- Perlis
- W.P. Putrajaya
- W.P. Labuan
- Perak
- Others

**QR Code Image:**
http or https something

**Remarks:**
{name}, {source} - {url} (eg: khairin, facebook - facebook.com/something) example: https://github.com/khrnchn/sedekah-je/blob/main/app/data/institutions.ts#L8835
